generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings and directional arrows, indicating it is a road for vehicles.
- sidewalk: There is a paved sidewalk running parallel to the road on the right side, separated by a curb and bordered by a fence.
- building: A long, light-colored building with windows and a roof is visible on the left side of the road.
- wall: A low, gray wall runs along the left side of the road, adjacent to the building.
- fence: A tall, black metal fence with brick pillars is visible along the right side of the road.
- pole: A tall, curved streetlight pole is visible on the left side of the road.
- traffic sign: A white traffic sign with a black symbol is visible on a pole on the left side of the road.
- vegetation: Trees and bushes are visible along both sides of the road.
- terrain: Grass and some patches of soil are visible along the edges of the road and sidewalk.
- sky: The sky is visible above the trees and buildings, appearing light blue with some clouds.
- car: The front of a car, including the Mercedes-Benz emblem, is visible at the bottom of the image, indicating the perspective from inside a vehicle.
